title: EchoFactyt — Bright, Modern Content Website for Teens & Young Adults

requirements.text: Design and apply a vibrant, youthful visual theme across the entire site: bold gradient accents (e.g., coral-to-yellow or teal-to-lime), modern sans-serif typography (large bold headings, readable body text), colorful category badges, card-based layout, smooth hover effects, and fully responsive mobile-first layout. No blue/purple.

quotes: clean, colorful, fast-loading, SEO-friendly, and easy to navigate, with bold headings, modern fonts, and a well-organized layout

acceptanceCriteria: Site renders cleanly on mobile (320px+), tablet, and desktop
Consistent color palette and typography used throughout all sections
All interactive elements have visible hover/focus states

requirements.text: Build a full-width hero banner at the top of the homepage with a catchy tagline (e.g., 'Discover Facts That Actually Matter'), a short subtitle, and three CTA buttons: 'Learn More', 'Try Now', and 'Watch Video'. The banner should use a bold gradient background and a generated hero illustration.

quotes: call-to-action buttons like "Learn More," "Try Now," and "Watch Video"

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is visible on page load with all three CTA buttons
CTA buttons scroll to or link to relevant sections on the page
Hero is fully responsive

requirements.text: Create a 'Trending Facts' section displaying at least 6 colorful fact cards. Each card shows a category badge, a short interesting fact (2–3 sentences), a topic icon, and a 'Learn More' button. Facts should span categories: technology, school, health, entertainment, and daily life.

quotes: short, interesting facts, life hacks, and useful tips

acceptanceCriteria: At least 6 fact cards visible in a responsive grid
Each card has a category badge with distinct color per category
'Learn More' button is present on every card

requirements.text: Add a 'Top 10 Lists' section with at least 3 sample Top 10 lists (e.g., 'Top 10 Study Hacks', 'Top 10 Free Apps for Students', 'Top 10 Healthy Snacks'). Each list is shown as a numbered card or accordion panel with a title, brief description, and a 'Try Now' CTA button.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 Top 10 lists are displayed
Each list item is numbered and styled consistently
'Try Now' button is present on each list card

requirements.text: Create a 'Step-by-Step Guides' section with at least 3 sample guides (e.g., 'How to Build a Study Schedule', 'How to Stay Healthy on a Budget'). Each guide is displayed as a card with a title, numbered steps, and a 'Learn More' button.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 guides are shown with numbered step lists
Guide cards are responsive and readable on mobile
'Learn More' CTA is present on each guide

requirements.text: Build a 'Videos' section that embeds YouTube Shorts and videos. Use iframe embeds with a visually appealing grid or carousel layout. Include at least 4 embedded video placeholders using real YouTube embed URLs (e.g., popular EchoFactyt-style short educational videos). Each video card should have a title and a 'Watch Video' button/label.

quotes: Embed YouTube Shorts and videos from EchoFactyt for each fact or tip, with a visually appealing video section

acceptanceCriteria: At least 4 YouTube iframes are embedded and playable
Video section has a distinct visual layout (grid or carousel)
'Watch Video' label or button is visible on each video card
Video embeds are responsive and not cropped on mobile

requirements.text: Add an interactive Quiz module with at least one sample quiz (e.g., 'Which Study Style Are You?'). The quiz should present multiple-choice questions one at a time, track the user's answers in React state, and display a results screen at the end with a score or personality result.
acceptanceCriteria: Quiz displays at least 5 questions with 3–4 answer choices each
User can progress through questions and reach a result screen
Result screen shows a summary or score
Quiz is fully functional without a backend

requirements.text: Include at least 2 interactive calculators in a 'Calculators' section: (1) a GPA Calculator that takes course grades and credit hours and outputs a GPA, and (2) a Screen Time Tracker calculator that estimates daily digital wellness based on hours of screen time input. Both calculators must use React state for all computation.
acceptanceCriteria: GPA calculator accepts at least 3 course inputs and displays calculated GPA
Screen time calculator accepts hours input and shows a wellness assessment
Both calculators show results immediately on input change or button click

requirements.text: Create a 'Free Downloads' section with at least 4 freebie cards (e.g., 'Study Planner PDF', 'Healthy Meal Prep Checklist', 'Daily Habit Tracker', 'Tech Cheat Sheet'). Each card shows a title, description, and a 'Download Free' button. Buttons link to placeholder '#' or a static notice since file hosting is not available.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 4 freebie cards are displayed in a grid
Each card has title, description, and a download button
Cards are visually distinct and appealing

requirements.text: Add social media share buttons (Twitter/X, Facebook, WhatsApp, and Copy Link) on each fact card, guide card, and at the bottom of the quiz results screen. Clicking Twitter/X and Facebook should open a pre-filled share dialog using the page URL and a short share message. WhatsApp should open a whatsapp.com share link. Copy Link copies the current URL to clipboard.

quotes: Add social media share buttons to encourage sharing and increase traffic

acceptanceCriteria: Share buttons are visible on fact cards, guide cards, and quiz results
Twitter/X and Facebook buttons open share URLs in a new tab
WhatsApp button opens a WhatsApp share link
Copy Link button copies the URL and shows a brief 'Copied!' confirmation

requirements.text: Build a 'Popular Posts' sidebar or section showing at least 5 posts ranked by a view count stored in the Motoko backend. Each post has a title, category, and view count. Clicking a post increments its view count via a backend call.
acceptanceCriteria: Popular posts are fetched from the backend and displayed sorted by view count
Clicking a post increments its view count and re-renders the updated count
At least 5 seed posts are pre-loaded in the backend

requirements.text: Add a 'New Updates' section on the homepage displaying the most recently added facts or tips. The backend should store content items with a timestamp. The frontend fetches and displays the 4 most recent items in a highlighted 'New' badge card layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores content items with creation timestamps
Frontend displays the 4 most recent items with a 'New' badge
Section updates when new content is added

requirements.text: Implement a topic category filter/navigation bar with tabs or pill buttons for: All, Technology, School, Health, Entertainment, Daily Life. Clicking a category filters the Trending Facts, Guides, and Top 10 lists sections to show only items matching that category. Filter state is managed in React.

quotes: covering topics like technology, school, health, entertainment, and daily life

acceptanceCriteria: Category filter bar is visible and sticky or near the top of content sections
Selecting a category filters displayed cards correctly
'All' tab shows all content
Active category tab is visually highlighted

constraints: Do not implement actual email sending — email subscription form UI only
All calculators and quiz logic must run entirely in React state (no backend)
YouTube video embeds must use standard iframe embed URLs (no custom video hosting)
Social share buttons must use standard web share URLs, not authenticated APIs
nonGoals: Actual file hosting or PDF generation for downloads
CMS or admin dashboard for content management

required: Vibrant hero illustration with colorful abstract shapes, lightning bolt, lightbulb, and stars on a coral-to-yellow gradient background, suitable for a youth facts website (hero-banner.dim_1400x600.png)
Fun flat-style icons set: small icons for technology (chip), school (book), health (heart), entertainment (star), daily life (sun) on transparent backgrounds (category-icons.dim_512x512.png)
Bright decorative freebie download card background with confetti and ribbon elements (freebies-bg.dim_800x400.png)
